title: Average player salary in the Bundesliga 2019/20 , by team
yAxis: Average player salary in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Average player salary in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Average player salary in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Bayern Munich and lowest at Month Paderborn.
There is a difference of 7.7 between the maximum Month Bayern Munich and minimum Month Paderborn.

The Average player salary in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Bayern Munich and lowest at Month Paderborn.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average player salary in million U.S. dollars for 18 number of Months.
The maximum Average player salary in million U.S. dollars 8.12 is found at Month Bayern Munich and the minimum is found at Paderborn where Average player salary in million U.S. dollars is 0.42.
The highest Month Bayern Munich has 7.7 more Average player salary in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Month Paderborn.
The Month Bayern Munich has the highest Average player salary in million U.S. dollars, followed by , and Bayer Leverkusen. Down to the Month Paderborn which is the lowest.
Overall Average player salary in million U.S. dollars has decreased over the Months.
The lowest value 0.42 at Paderborn is almost 3.95 times smaller than the average value 2.06.
